preference.name: SUBSCMPL_request_msd_format
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default IPC XML file format for material substance declaration requests. Also make sure corresponding xsl changes are done in SUBSCMPL_msd_request_xsl_file preference. Valid values are: * IPC_1752A: IPC 1752A format XML document is sent to vendors. This is the default value. * IPC_1752-2: IPC 1752-2v1.1 format XML document is sent to vendors.
